name: Project Podcast Game!
description:
A game by the Lyra Project Podcast crew, to give you a podcast in game form!

Move Blob by using the arrows on your keyboard, or swiping the touch screen on a smartphone.

Speak to all the characters in the game to hear what the Project Podcast crew are talking about this week - which is what they're looking forward to in future!

Game, Characters & Soundtrack by:

Ola, Vindhya, Zuza, Dawid, Bright, Eduardo, Julia, Anna, Michael, & Luci (Project Podcast (Lyra Music Group))

This game is made using Bitsy:

https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

Hear more Project Podcasts here:

https://soundcloud.com/lyra_sound

With thanks to Lyra and the Project Podcast crew!
